title: Jane Seymour
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: People/Jane Seymour, Queen, Consort of Henry VIII, King of England, 1509-1537
History/Jane Seymour, Queen, Consort of Henry VIII, King of England, 1509-1537
description: Episode number 3 of Series "The Six wives of Henry VIII". After his stormy and fatal relationship with Anne Boleyn, Henry VIII falls in love with her absolute antithesis - the shy and devout Jane Seymour. Calm, serene, gentle and giving, she comforts and cherishes her king with loyalty and love - she even bears him a son. But the lives of both Jane and her child soon come to a tragic end.
